isis.stitle: SINGLE REDUCTION, TANDEM DRIVE AXLES: EATON - INSPECTION - IN-VEHICLE INSPECTION

svcprocinfo.para: When a vehicle is brought in for service, several in-vehicle inspections can be made prior to removal of the differential carrier assembly.

svcsubproc.title: Forward Axle Input Shaft End Play Check
svcsubproc.para: With power divider assembled to differential carrier, measure end play with a dial indicator positioned at the yoke end of the input shaft. Move input shaft axially and measure end play ( Figure 9).

step1.para: Use a pry bar to press out on nut.
Read dial indicator and record reading.

svcsubproc.para: Correct end play for a new assembly is .003 to .007 inch. The maximum end play for a used assembly is no more than 0.14 inch.
If reading exceeds the numbers listed above, contact your International dealer.

svcsubproc.title: Forward Axle Output Shaft End Play Check
svcsubproc.para: With rear cover assembly installed on the axle housing, check output shaft end play with a dial indicator positioned on the yoke end of the output shaft. Move shaft axially and measure end play ( Figure 9).
Maximum end play for the output shaft is no more than .005 inch. If the reading exceeds .005 inch, contact your International dealer.
